name: LifeLine (Arias / Adrien, KoffeeKoffee, KaZede, Florian LENTZ, Xc3l, Eckaos, Hugo Lefebvre)
name_original: LifeLine (Arias / Adrien, KoffeeKoffee, KaZede, Florian LENTZ, Xc3l, Eckaos, Hugo Lefebvre)
description:
LifeLine

Protect your lifeline and your dreams

Made during Unijam 2022

Play with a friend in a local coop game.

You will play a brother and a sister spirits who defend their home from bad dreams and nightmares .

The two are linked in their dreams by a LifeLine and can use trees and their abilities to defend the house.

Credits : 

Adrien "Arias" Maginot : Project Manager, Game Designer, Level Designer, Developer

Anaïs "Café" Trinquet : Developer

Nathan "Eckaos" Pollart : Developer

Céline "Escargot" Wang : Game Designer, Graphic Designer

Hugo "Hugo" Lefebvre : Game Designer, Graphic Designer

Quentin "KZ" Pepe : Developer

Florian "Omis" Lents : Developer
